tool_description: Find synonyms for more than 50 different languages
title: Synonyms Finder

api_list.name: Synonyms
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://synonyms-finder.p.rapidapi.com/api/data"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "synonyms-finder.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
